Package org.oxt.toolbox.cli

package org.oxt.toolbox.cli
  • Klasse
    Beschreibung
    CLICii2ubl
    Class implementing the conversion processing from command line (implements the ICLICii2ubl interface).
    CLIValidation
    Class implementing the validation processing from command line (implements the ICLIValidation interface).
    CLIVisualization
    Class implementing the visualization processing from command line (implements the ICLIVisualization interface).
    ICLICii2ubl
    Interface defining the methods for invoice conversion from command line access.
    ICLIValidation
    Interface defining the methods for XRechnung validation from command line.
    ICLIVisualization
    Interface defining the methods for XRechnung visualization from command line.
